content: stich throught the back loop wrap the next stitch and turn r4 ws purl across to unworked double wrapped stitch purl decrease wraps and stitch wrap the next stitch and turn repeat r3+r4 until all sts have been worked ending on r4 knit across heel sts foot if you want a narrower feet you can add some decreases on sole stitches i made 2 decreases on each sock s side 62 sts 33 sts instep and 29 sts sole knit in patt the instep sts and knit across the sole sts to 4 5 cm 1 3/4 inches less foot lengh toe rearrange stiches to have a equal number on each side 31 + 31 r1 decrease round *k1 ssk knit to last 3 sts of the sole k2tog k1* repeat for instep stiches 58 sts r 2-4 knit r5 decrease round 54 sts r 6-7 knit r8 decrease round 50 sts r 9-10 knit r11 decrease round 46 sts r12 knit r13 decrease round 42 sts r14 knit r15 decrease round 38 sts r16 knit r17 decrease round 34 sts r18 decrease round 30 sts r19 decrease round 26 sts r20 decrease round 22 sts graft the stitches together cut yarn and weave in ends © christine monnard 2012 - this pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all right reserved if you have error reports or any suggestions concerning this pattern you can contact me on ravelry as «louelivert» murano socks english v1 pages 2/2
